FuncDef:
The vrrp-id command binds an RBP to a specified VRRP backup group.
The undo vrrp-id command unbinds an RBP from a VRRP backup group.
By default, no RBP is bound to a VRRP backup group .

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a VRRP backup group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

Specifies the type and number of an interface configured with a VRRP group.
-

Binds an RBP to a VRRP backup group in odd MAC address mode.
-

Binds an RBP to a VRRP backup group in even MAC address mode.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before applying an RBP to the interface with a VRRP backup group configured, run the vrrp-id command to bind the RBP to the VRRP backup group. You can run the command to bind an RBP to a VRRP backup group in odd or even MAC address mode.
Prerequisites
An RBP has been created using the remote-backup-profile command in the system view.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the remote-backup-profile command in the interface view to bind the RBP to the interface with the VRRP backup group configured.
Precautions
The ID of the VRRP backup group bound with an RBP must be the same as the ID of the VRRP backup group configured on the corresponding interface.
